lead_paragraph: Moving to Real Madrid has made Gareth Bale a better person and lived up to all his expectations, the Welsh winger said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Real Madrid the Perfect Club for Me, Says Bale
headline.main: Real Madrid the Perfect Club for Me, Says Bale

snippet: Moving to Real Madrid has made Gareth Bale a better person and lived up to all his expectations, the Welsh winger said on Monday....
